author: wn.com
title: Family-friendly budget ensures right people benefit from recovery - Nolan (Irish Labour Party)
text: ( Source : Irish Labour Party ) 13 October 2015 Statement by Derek Nolan TD Galway West TD Derek Nolan has said that today's budget has delivered a package of measures which will focus primarily on benefitting families across Ireland . Speaking
